frontmatter.title: Deep Dives in Code- Exploring Advanced Concepts
frontmatter.abstract: Coding got you down? Supercharge your skills with advanced concepts like self-changing code (metaprogramming) and multitasking programs (multithreading).  "Hello world" to world domination in no time (almost).
